author: Beth Mole
title: Americans are poisoning themselves while trying to kill the coronavirus
description: As the pandemic picked up in the US, so did poison reports.
content:
Enlarge/ Bottles of Clorox bleach sit on a shelf at a grocery store.
10 with 9 posters participating
From adults creating chlorine gas in their kitchens to toddlers guzzling hand sanitizer, Americans seem to be inadvertently poisoning themselves as they try… [+4485 chars]
